author: Carlos Lobato
text: Do any of you know or are aware of any resources that would help me find a good benchmark to determine what would be a proper number of construction projects that should be managed per Project Manager?  Other benchmarks would be helpful as well such as dollar amount/complexity of project, etc.
title: Performance Measures Construction Project Management
